summary: 检测用友U8 Cloud系统的XChangeServlet接口是否存在XXE漏洞，该漏洞可能导致服务器数据泄露和被远控
summary_en: Detect XXE vulnerability in the XChangeServlet interface of Yonyou U8 Cloud system, which may lead to server data leakage and remote control
